Content:
```2

These are steps:

    Go to Settings -> Apps -> Play Store and then tap Clear Data and Cache
    Go to Settings -> Accounts -> Google and then Remove Account
    Restart your phone
    Log in with your Google Account and open Play Store.

Done
``` maybe such way can help
